duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the EVP General Counsel & SVP of HR with day-to-day administrative tasks
Coordinate and set up for department meetings and events, including calendar invites, technical and physical set up (i.e., food and logistics)
Create, format, and distribute internal and external communications
Maintain and order office supplies while ensuring the physical office is in good order
Manage information flow in a timely and accurate manner
Support the Legal & HR staff with day-to-day administrative support tasks
